resources.string:
Instructions on how to import your schedule:

 Download your schedule from MyUW:
• Navigate to MyUW Course Schedule section.
• Click on the 'Print' button on the left side of the page.
• This should save a pdf file in your device's file manager.

 Import the pdf file into UW Course Guide:
• Import the downloaded pdf into UW Course Guide App marked by the 📄 icon.
• After it has been imported, the schedule should display all your classes and the location tab should be updated with all the locations of your classes (if any).
Search for course you want to review...
You\'re reviewing: CS 407 Foundation of Mobile Systems and Applications
